## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a80cd9d2c299ab298d753637d18ed260c3270fabd2b99ed8ac6bbe98b0f66cf9)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'para-gen' @ 93.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
